thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 3 of 67
thread.title: jaime torres

author: jaime torres
title: jaime torres
text: While working on a website I came across a question I could not answer elsewhere. I purchased a theme almost two-weeks piror to this question, but without hesitation or delay my Technicians Andre and Susan came to my recuse. I run a small website/Storefront so any time delays mean lost sales but Susan gave me such effective and Fast customer service and then Forwarded me to an absolute expert, Andre, who was very easy to understand and work with helping me untangle a question in a few short momoents. After this interaction, I will begin to recommend this service to anyone working on similar projects. The Themes are easy to use and beautiful, and now I've learned that the customer service is pleasant and second to none. Six stars
